basics.name: Gautier Dhordain
basics.label: Full stack developer
basics.summary:
I am a full stack developer who worked in various environment, from early stage startup to big corporations, with B2B & B2C business. I held several positions, always in development.
What do I like the most ? To bring value to customers using the product I am working on.
What I am looking for ? To help companies to deliver better mobile experiences.

work.summary:
MooM is a platform dedicated to ease circular economy: give a second life to your goods, find a repair or collection service.
I worked on all the layers: mainly on the mobile app, secondarily on the backend & search capabilities. Flutter discovery was a blast!
work.name: MooM Planet

work.summary: Auchan.fr is a french multinational retail group's ecommerce website. I was the tech lead of a team focused on the search feature then joined as tech lead another team focused on the customer (authentication, privacy, loyalty, ...) & GDPR technical point of contact. We built & ran several backend & frontend microservices, hosted on GKE. I enjoyed being a bridge between teams, with transversal missions.
work.name: Auchan Retail France

work.summary: Axon Insight AG offers a business network intelligence solution as SaaS or on premise. We worked in a multi-cultural european team, with direct relation with an offshore team based in Vietnam. I worked on the network batch processing and on the full-text search capabilities of the solution. I had the opportunity to go twice in Vietnam to organize a hackaton with our Vietnamese coworkers.
work.name: Axon Insight AG

work.summary: Nuukik offers a recommendation engine SaaS. We worked in close colaboration with the CTO to build and run a successful product from the early prototype. I helped the team to grow, from size and maturity perspective. I also wrote plugins for major ecommerce platforms (Magento, Prestashop, Demandware, ...) to ease customer onboarding.
work.name: Nuukik

work.summary: I worked on Oracle Service Bus to allow the company exogenous systems to talk to each others. I also took part of the team responsible of a custom OSB monitoring tool to increase the visibility and trust of the service.
work.name: 3 Suisses

work.summary: For a european freight exchange, I was part of the backend team. My primary role was to work on the scalability of the platform. I was heaviliy involved in the data layer to increase query responsivness and pertinence.
work.name: Atow Wordline

volunteer.summary: Town councillor of Bachy (around 1800 inhabitants), involved in cultural topics
volunteer.name: Town council of Bachy

volunteer.summary: Ch'ti JUG is a Java User Group based in Lille, north of France
volunteer.name: Ch'ti JUG
